tool.name: Sort

param.name: Sort_by_name
param.label: Sort by read name instead of coordinate (lexicographical order)

param.name: Natural_sort
param.label: Sort by read name instead of coordinate (so-called 'natural' sort as in samtools)

param.name: Uncompressed_chunks
param.label: Write sorted chunks as uncompressed BAM (default is writing with compression level 1), that might be faster in some cases but uses more disk space

param.name: Filter
param.label: Keep only reads that satisfy this filter
